author: RnR Market Research
title: Traffic Management System Market 2015 - 2020 Research Repor
text:
PUNE, India , October 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Global Traffic Management Systems Industry 2015 Market Research Report provides a basic overview of the traffic management system market including its definitions, classifications, applications and industry chain structure.
Complete report on traffic management system market of 189 pages, profiling 12 companies and supported with 200 tables and figures is now available at available at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/global-traffic-management-systems-industry-2015-market-research-report-market-report.html .
The traffic management system market analysis is provided for the international markets including development trends, competitive landscape analysis, and key regions development status in this research. Development policies and plans are discussed as well as manufacturing processes and cost structures are also analyzed. This traffic management system market report also states import/export consumption, supply and demand figures, cost, price, revenue and gross margins.
The report focuses on global major leading industry players of traffic management system market providing information such as company profiles, product picture and specification, capacity, production, price, cost, revenue and contact information. Upstream raw materials and equipment and downstream demand analysis is also carried out. The Traffic Management System market development trends and marketing channels are analyzed. Finally the feasibility of new investment projects are assessed and overall research conclusions offered.
With 200 tables and figures the report provides key statistics on the state of the industry and is a valuable source of guidance and direction for companies and individuals interested in traffic management system market. Companies profiled in this research include IBM, Swarco, Iteris, Cellint Traffic Solutions, Kapsch TrafficCom, Siemens, THALES, TomTom, Cubic, Decell Technologies, Accenture and Cambridge Systematics. Order a copy of Global Traffic Management Systems Industry 2015 Market Research Report at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/contacts/purchase?rname=407875 .
On a relevant note, another research titled Global Parking Reservation Systems Market by Type (On-street, Off-street), by Solution (Web-based, Mobile Application-based, Voice Call-based), by Vertical, by Geography ( North America , Europe , Asia-Pacific , Middle-East & Africa , Latin America ) - Analysis and Forecast to 2019 and available with RnRMarketResearch.com says in 2014, North America dominated the parking reservation systems market with revenue of $196.2 million in 2014 and is expected to reach $491.2 million by 2019 at a CAGR of 20.1%. The major market players are Vinci Park , Q-Park, Streetline, and National Car Parks (NCP).
The parking reservation systems market report covers web-based, mobile application-based, and voice call-based solutions. The type includes on-street parking and off-street parking. The regions include North America , Asia-Pacific , Europe , Middle East Africa, and Latin America . Some of the main drivers of the market are rise in the number of vehicles, availability of real-time information with guidance to park, and the awareness regarding smart parking projects and traffic management system market. This system has been integrated into several sectors such as transportation transits, retail, government & municipalities, healthcare and education, shopping centers, and hotels. Companies like Vinci Park , Standard Parking Corporation, Streetline, Q-Park, National Car Parks, Justpark, Parkme, Apcoa, Laz Parking and Ace Parking are discussed in this research available at http://www.rnrmarketresearch.com/global-parking-reservation-systems-market-by-type-on-street-off-street-by-solution-web-based-mobile-application-based-voice-call-based-by-vertical-by-geography-market-report.html .
